languages.text: "Предполагаю, что под этим именем скрывается благословенный Амарнат. Это имя — знак для меня. Его нахождение в руках еретиков категорически неприемлемо. Канон безопасности технологии велит приложить все усилия, чтобы освободить высокопоставленного носителя знания".

traits.locale_text: "Под именем Авеля Ханейманн явно скрывается благословенный Амарнат. Это имя — знак для меня. Его нахождение в руках еретиков категорически неприемлимо. Канон безопасности технологии велит приложить все усилия, чтобы освободить столь высокопоставленного носителя знания из-под власти богохульников".

languages.text: "I propose that it was the blessed Amarnat who assumed this name. This name is a sign to me. His presence in the hands of heretics is categorically unacceptable. The Canon of Technological Security commands that every effort be made to rescue a high-ranking bearer of knowledge."
languages.original_text: "Предполагаю, что под этим именем скрывается благословенный Амарнат. Это имя — знак для меня. Его нахождение в руках еретиков категорически неприемлемо. Канон безопасности технологии велит приложить все усилия, чтобы освободить высокопоставленного носителя знания".

traits.locale_text: "It is clearly the blessed Amarnat who assumed the name of Abel Haneumann. This name is a sign to me. His presence in the hands of heretics is emphatically unacceptable. The Canon of Technological Security commands that every effort be made to rescue such a high-ranking bearer of knowledge from the clutches of blasphemers."

"It is clearly the blessed Amarnat who assumed the name of Abel Haneumann. This name is a sign to me. His presence in the hands of heretics is emphatically unacceptable. The Canon of Technological Security commands that every effort be made to rescue such a high-ranking bearer of knowledge from the clutches of blasphemers."

"I propose that it was the blessed Amarnat who assumed the name of Abel Haneumann. This name is a sign to me. His presence in the hands of heretics is categorically unacceptable. The Canon of Technological Security commands that every effort be made to rescue such a high-ranking bearer of knowledge from the clutches of blasphemers."

"I propose that it was the blessed Amarnat who assumed the name of Abel Haneumann. This name is a sign to me. His presence in the hands of heretics is categorically unacceptable. The Canon of Technological Security commands that every effort be made to rescue such a high-ranking bearer of knowledge from the clutches of blasphemers."

"I propose that it was the blessed Amarnat who assumed the name of Abel Haneumann. This name is a sign to me. His presence in the hands of heretics is categorically unacceptable. The Canon of Technological Security commands that every effort be made to rescue such a high-ranking bearer of knowledge from the clutches of blasphemers."

"I propose that it was the blessed Amarnat who assumed this name. This name is a sign to me. His presence in the hands of heretics is categorically unacceptable. The Canon of Technological Security commands that every effort be made to rescue a high-ranking bearer of knowledge."

languages.text: «Postulo que fue el bendito Amarnat quien adoptó este nombre para enviarme un mensaje. Su presencia en manos de herejes es categóricamente inaceptable. El Canon de Seguridad Tecnológica dictamina que debe hacerse todo lo posible por rescatar a un portador de conocimiento de alto rango».
languages.original_text: "I propose that it was the blessed Amarnat who assumed this name. This name is a sign to me. His presence in the hands of heretics is categorically unacceptable. The Canon of Technological Security commands that every effort be made to rescue a high-ranking bearer of knowledge."

traits.locale_text: «Postulo que fue el bendito Amarnat quien adoptó este nombre para enviarme un mensaje. Su presencia en manos de herejes es categóricamente inaceptable. El Canon de Seguridad Tecnológica dictamina que debe hacerse todo lo posible por rescatar a un portador de conocimiento de alto rango».

languages.text: 「祝福されしアマルナトが彼を名乗っていたのだと推測する。この名前はある兆しのように思える。異端者の手中に彼がいることは断じて許されない。技術セキュリティの規則は、高位の知識の伝達者を救出するためにあらゆる努力を払うよう命じている」
languages.original_text: "I propose that it was the blessed Amarnat who assumed this name. This name is a sign to me. His presence in the hands of heretics is categorically unacceptable. The Canon of Technological Security commands that every effort be made to rescue a high-ranking bearer of knowledge."

traits.locale_text: 「祝福されしアマルナトが彼を名乗っていたのだと推測する。この名前はある兆しのように思える。異端者の手中に彼がいることは断じて許されない。技術セキュリティの規則は、高位の知識の伝達者を救出するためにあらゆる努力を払うよう命じている」

languages.text: “我猜想，这是蒙福者阿玛纳特取的假名。这个名字对我来说是个预兆。若是让他落入异端分子手中，这是绝对不可接受的结果。技术安全规范要求我们尽一切努力，营救那位尊贵的知识传播者。”
languages.original_text: "I propose that it was the blessed Amarnat who assumed this name. This name is a sign to me. His presence in the hands of heretics is categorically unacceptable. The Canon of Technological Security commands that every effort be made to rescue a high-ranking bearer of knowledge."

traits.locale_text: “我猜想，这是蒙福者阿玛纳特取的假名。这个名字对我来说是个预兆。若是让他落入异端分子手中，这是绝对不可接受的结果。技术安全规范要求我们尽一切努力，营救那位尊贵的知识传播者。”

languages.text: « Je pense que c'est le bienheureux Amarnat qui a pris ce nom. C'est un signe qui m'est adressé. Sa présence aux mains des hérétiques est catégoriquement inacceptable. Le Canon de la Sécurité Technologique exige que tous les efforts soient faits pour secourir un porteur de savoir de haut rang. »
languages.original_text: "I propose that it was the blessed Amarnat who assumed this name. This name is a sign to me. His presence in the hands of heretics is categorically unacceptable. The Canon of Technological Security commands that every effort be made to rescue a high-ranking bearer of knowledge."

traits.locale_text: « Je pense que c'est le bienheureux Amarnat qui a pris ce nom. C'est un signe qui m'est adressé. Sa présence aux mains des hérétiques est catégoriquement inacceptable. Le Canon de la Sécurité Technologique exige que tous les efforts soient faits pour secourir un porteur de savoir de haut rang. »

languages.text: "Ich gehe davon aus, dass es der gesegnete Amarnat war, der diesen Namen angenommen hat. Dieser Name ist eine Botschaft an mich. Seine Anwesenheit in den Händen von Ketzern ist absolut inakzeptabel. Der Kanon der Technologischen Sicherheit schreibt vor, dass alle Anstrengungen unternommen werden, um einen hochrangigen Wissensträger zu retten."
languages.original_text: "I propose that it was the blessed Amarnat who assumed this name. This name is a sign to me. His presence in the hands of heretics is categorically unacceptable. The Canon of Technological Security commands that every effort be made to rescue a high-ranking bearer of knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gehe davon aus, dass es der gesegnete Amarnat war, der diesen Namen angenommen hat. Dieser Name ist eine Botschaft an mich. Seine Anwesenheit in den Händen von Ketzern ist absolut inakzeptabel. Der Kanon der Technologischen Sicherheit schreibt vor, dass alle Anstrengungen unternommen werden, um einen hochrangigen Wissensträger zu retten."

languages.original_text: "I propose that it was the blessed Amarnat who assumed this name. This name is a sign to me. His presence in the hands of heretics is categorically unacceptable. The Canon of Technological Security commands that every effort be made to rescue a high-ranking bearer of knowledge."

languages.text: "Kutsanmış Amarnat kendisini bu isimle gizlediği kanısındayım. Bu isim benim için bir işaret. Mevcudiyetinin kâfirlerin elinde olması, kategorik olarak kabul edilemez. Teknolojik Güvenlik Nizamı'nın emirlerine göre yüksek rütbeli irfan sahiplerinin kurtarılması için her türlü çaba gösterilmelidir."
languages.original_text: "I propose that it was the blessed Amarnat who assumed this name. This name is a sign to me. His presence in the hands of heretics is categorically unacceptable. The Canon of Technological Security commands that every effort be made to rescue a high-ranking bearer of knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Bu ismi kullanan kişinin kutsanmış Amarnat olduğu kanısındayım. Bu isim benim için bir işaret. Mevcudiyetinin kâfirlerin elinde olması kategorik olarak kabul edilemez. Teknolojik Güvenlik Nizamı'nın emirlerine göre üst rütbedeki bir irfan sahibinin kurtarılması için her türlü efor sarf edilmelidir."
